entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tatlayoko Lake 10:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
